title: Horizontal Green line on top of new Google Pixel 4
content:
Firstly the photo makes the light much brighter but in person it is still noticeable throughout the day especially at night. I got this phone just under 4 weeks ago and there was no line.
However yesterday I noticed it, I tried restarting my phone but it still was there. 
My settings are all at default, the only thing that I have done is then of the always on feature that shows the clock.
When adjusting the brightness it is more visible when the screen is brighter.
I have tried searching this forum but have not found a similar problem. The closest I could find was people talking about a vertical line through the middle of the phone. Is this the same problem? And can it be fixed or will I need to return it .

Many thanks
